abstract: In a look at about two dozen cases, when owners appealed Community Board 3's rejection of their applications, the State Liquor Authority almost always approved them.
snippet: In a look at about two dozen cases, when owners appealed Community Board 3's rejection of their applications, the State Liquor Authority almost always approved them.

headline.main: State Officials Have Frequently Overruled Local Board's Rejection of Liquor Licenses
